# FIT Solar - Next.js 14/15 Landing Page Project

## Project Overview
Solar Energy Landing Page for FIT Solar using Next.js 14/15, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, and shadcn/ui.

## Project Structure
- **components/sections/**: Modular section components (Header, Hero, CategoryGrid, etc.)
- **components/ui/**: Reusable base components from shadcn/ui
- **app/**: Next.js App Router pages

## Setup Status
- [x] Verify copilot-instructions.md created
- [x] Scaffold Next.js project with TypeScript and Tailwind
- [x] Install shadcn/ui
- [x] Create all section components
- [x] Configure SEO and custom colors
- [x] Test and compile project

## Design System
- **Primary Color**: Emerald Green (#10B981)
- **Secondary**: White, Neutral Gray (#F5F5F5)
- **Font**: Inter (Primary), Bold Sans-serif for headings
- **Slogan**: "Tối ưu tiền điện - Bền bỉ cùng thời gian"
